Desc.entry: As part of implementing the published directive of the Department of Health in 2005 "Delivering Race Equality in Mental Health Care", Community Development Workers have been appointed by the Sheffield PCT to look at mental health issues within the black and minority ethnic (BME) communities. The team aims to helps groups and individuals to identify needs and concerns and to support groups and individuals in working out solutions. Supports local groups and networks to become partners in developing and improving mental health and social care services. Signposts people to information, resources and sources of funding.
